about_the_game:
Make weapons, make money.

Start your own military industrial complex enterprise! Begin by making bullets by hand, then with machines, then acquire entire factories. Expand into making guns, tanks, planes, and even nukes. Research new products, faster and cheaper ways to make them, and better methods of making money. Enter the stock market to raise capital, buyout rival companies, or perform market manipulation. Lobby the government for fewer regulations, better contracts, and more demand for your products. Turn the entire economy into a weapons making machine, making you ludicrous amounts of money.

Features:

  • Multiple different weapons to produce, each with their own unique way of being made, and upgrades to unlock

  • Automate production, so you can focus on other things

  • Research new products to produce, better methods of making them, helpful UI additions, ways of increasing your prices, and much more

  • Buy shares of various companies on the Stock Market, unlocking powerful bonuses once you own certain threshold amounts

  • Lobby politicians and spend favors to radically upgrade your other systems

  • Earn enough profit and you can prestige to unlock game-changing abilities that allow for a variety of different builds for each new run

  • Overall, make ridiculous amounts of money as you flood the world with more and more weapons

name: Military Incremental Complex

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Ryzen 1600 or Core i5-7600K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 or Radeon RX 580
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Ryzen 3600 or Core i5-10500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1660 or Radeon RX 6600
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Make weapons, make money. An active incremental game where you amass as much money as you can by starting a Military Industrial Complex company. Produce multiple different weapons, research upgrades, manipulate the stock market, and lobby the government for favors.
